item.title: The attrition of the modern scholary record
item.description: Brief summary An extensive and ongoing attrition of the modern scholarly record is undermining a number of important research activities that support verification, discovery, and evidence synthesis. This undermines the efficiency and credibility of the scientific endeavour. Recently, we launched the Data Ark initiative – an attempt to retrieve, preserve, and liberate important scientific data. However, most of our data requests were not successful. How can we ensure the longevity and accessibility of important research artifacts?
